mapper.select: select max(MAINID) as max_Id from cqwu_theoryCourse
mapper.insert:
insert into cqwu_theoryCourse( MAINID, ISVALID, ISDELETED, theoryHours, versionCode, isAvailable, courseCode, user_courseCode, courseName, institutionsCode, credit, totalHours, experimentHours, practiceHours, otherHours, courseType
) values ( #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ISVALID}, #{ISDELETED}, #{ZXS,jdbcType=FLOAT}, '2017', 1, #{DM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ZWMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CDDW_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ZXF,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{totalHours,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{SYXS,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{sjxs,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{qtxs,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{p_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
